biocontainers.name: pydna
biocontainers.summary: Representing double stranded dna and simulating cloning, homologous recombination, gibson assembly, gel electrophoresis etc.

biotools.summary: An extensible, free and open source Python library for simulating basic molecular biology DNA unit operations such as restriction digestion, ligation, PCR, primer design, Gibson assembly and homologous recombination.
